claim: Zach Galifianakis was passed over for a role in The Campaign.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He has also starred in films , such as The Hangover trilogy  (  2009 -- 2013  )  , Due Date  (  2010  )  , The Campaign  (  2012  )  , Birdman or  (  The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance  )   (  2014  )  , Puss in Boots  (  2011  )  , Masterminds  (  2016  )  and The Lego Batman Movie  (  2017  )  .
